Activity: It's Friday! Time to celebrate! Start the day with a fun podcast and a delicious pastry.
Check emails and address any urgent requests. Wrap up any outstanding tasks from the week.
Conduct a final review of all client documentation, subscription agreements, and communication materials. Ensure everything is perfect and ready for distribution.
Update the UHNWI onboarding checklist with any lessons learned during the week. Use this checklist to improve future onboarding processes.
Prepare a summary report of the week's accomplishments and challenges. Share this report with @Project Manager and other relevant stakeholders.
Lunch Time! Planning a fun weekend with friends and family.
Host a team celebration to recognize everyone's hard work and contributions to the UHNWI-focused fund launch. Time to party (responsibly, of course!).
Organize all client files and ensure proper storage and security measures are in place. @DevOps Engineer need help with backup and security strategy.
Brainstorm ideas for improving the UHNWI onboarding process in the future. Document these ideas and share them with relevant stakeholders.
Submit final documentation of the UHNWI client onboarding process to @Audit.
Wrap up the week and prepare for a relaxing weekend! Make sure to set an automatic out of office reply.
